attributes.action: STOP CONDOR FROM OPERATING FLIGHTS IN THE UK! UNLESS UK STAFF ARE RE-EMPLOYED!
attributes.additional_details:
Try to book flights with them from the UK! 

Condor were transferred millions by Thomas Cook the night the operator collapsed!
attributes.background: As I’m sure your aware Thomas Cook Airlines  and the Thomas cook group have collapsed. The German sister airline Condor and co has been saved. Now condor are offering flights to fly out of London Gatwick (a popular TCX base). As an employee of TCA I find this utterly disrespectful!

rejection.details:
You might like to sign this petition about a public inquiry:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/274851
